00016 #ifndef BT_MULTIBODY_LINK_H
00017 #define BT_MULTIBODY_LINK_H

00023 enum    btMultiBodyLinkFlags
00024 {
00025         BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION = 1,
00026         BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_ALL_PARENT_COLLISION = 2,

00030 #define BT_MULTIBODYLINK_INCLUDE_PLANAR_JOINTS
00031 #define TEST_SPATIAL_ALGEBRA_LAYER

00044 //
00045 // Link struct
00046 //
00047 
00048 struct btMultibodyLink 
00049 {
00050 
00051         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00052 
00053     btScalar m_mass;         // mass of link
00054     btVector3 m_inertiaLocal;   // inertia of link (local frame; diagonal)
00055 
00056     int m_parent;         // index of the parent link (assumed to be < index of this link), or -1 if parent is the base link.
00057 
00058     btQuaternion m_zeroRotParentToThis;    // rotates vectors in parent-frame to vectors in local-frame (when q=0). constant.
00059 
00060     btVector3 m_dVector;   // vector from the inboard joint pos to this link's COM. (local frame.) constant.
00061         //this is set to zero for planar joint (see also m_eVector comment)
00062         
00063     // m_eVector is constant, but depends on the joint type:
00064     // revolute, fixed, prismatic, spherical: vector from parent's COM to the pivot point, in PARENT's frame.
00065         // planar: vector from COM of parent to COM of this link, WHEN Q = 0. (local frame.)
00066         // todo: fix the planar so it is consistent with the other joints
00067         
00068     btVector3 m_eVector;
00069 
00070         btSpatialMotionVector m_absFrameTotVelocity, m_absFrameLocVelocity;
00071 
00072         enum eFeatherstoneJointType
00073         {
00074                 eRevolute = 0,
00075                 ePrismatic = 1,
00076                 eSpherical = 2,
00077                 ePlanar = 3,
00078                 eFixed = 4,
00079                 eInvalid
00080         };
00081 
00082         
00083 
00084         // "axis" = spatial joint axis (Mirtich Defn 9 p104). (expressed in local frame.) constant.
00085     // for prismatic: m_axesTop[0] = zero;
00086     //                m_axesBottom[0] = unit vector along the joint axis.
00087     // for revolute: m_axesTop[0] = unit vector along the rotation axis (u);
00088     //               m_axesBottom[0] = u cross m_dVector (i.e. COM linear motion due to the rotation at the joint)
00089         //
00090         // for spherical: m_axesTop[0][1][2] (u1,u2,u3) form a 3x3 identity matrix (3 rotation axes)
00091         //                                m_axesBottom[0][1][2] cross u1,u2,u3 (i.e. COM linear motion due to the rotation at the joint)
00092         //
00093         // for planar: m_axesTop[0] = unit vector along the rotation axis (u); defines the plane of motion
00094         //                         m_axesTop[1][2] = zero
00095         //                         m_axesBottom[0] = zero
00096         //                         m_axesBottom[1][2] = unit vectors along the translational axes on that plane         
00097         btSpatialMotionVector m_axes[6];
00098         void setAxisTop(int dof, const btVector3 &axis) { m_axes[dof].m_topVec = axis; }
00099         void setAxisBottom(int dof, const btVector3 &axis) 
00100         { 
00101                 m_axes[dof].m_bottomVec = axis; 
00102         }
00103         void setAxisTop(int dof, const btScalar &x, const btScalar &y, const btScalar &z) 
00104         {
00105                 m_axes[dof].m_topVec.setValue(x, y, z); 
00106         }
00107         void setAxisBottom(int dof, const btScalar &x, const btScalar &y, const btScalar &z) 
00108         { 
00109                 m_axes[dof].m_bottomVec.setValue(x, y, z); 
00110         }
00111         const btVector3 & getAxisTop(int dof) const { return m_axes[dof].m_topVec; }
00112         const btVector3 & getAxisBottom(int dof) const { return m_axes[dof].m_bottomVec; }
00113 
00114         int m_dofOffset, m_cfgOffset;
00115 
00116     btQuaternion m_cachedRotParentToThis;   // rotates vectors in parent frame to vectors in local frame
00117     btVector3 m_cachedRVector;                // vector from COM of parent to COM of this link, in local frame.
00118 
00119     btVector3 m_appliedForce;    // In WORLD frame
00120     btVector3 m_appliedTorque;   // In WORLD frame
00121 
00122 btVector3 m_appliedConstraintForce;    // In WORLD frame
00123     btVector3 m_appliedConstraintTorque;   // In WORLD frame
00124 
00125         btScalar m_jointPos[7];
00126     
00127     //m_jointTorque is the joint torque applied by the user using 'addJointTorque'.
00128     //It gets set to zero after each internal stepSimulation call
00129         btScalar m_jointTorque[6];
00130     
00131         class btMultiBodyLinkCollider* m_collider;
00132         int m_flags;
00133         
00134         
00135         int m_dofCount, m_posVarCount;                          //redundant but handy
00136         
00137         eFeatherstoneJointType m_jointType;
00138         
00139         struct btMultiBodyJointFeedback*        m_jointFeedback;
00140 
00141         btTransform     m_cachedWorldTransform;//this cache is updated when calling btMultiBody::forwardKinematics
00142 
00143         const char* m_linkName;//m_linkName memory needs to be managed by the developer/user!
00144         const char* m_jointName;//m_jointName memory needs to be managed by the developer/user!
00145     const void* m_userPtr;//m_userPtr ptr needs to be managed by the developer/user!
00146     
00147         btScalar m_jointDamping; //todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader. User can apply manual damping.
00148         btScalar m_jointFriction; //todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader. User can apply manual friction using a velocity motor.
00149         btScalar m_jointLowerLimit; //todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader. 
00150         btScalar m_jointUpperLimit; //todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader.
00151         btScalar m_jointMaxForce; //todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader. 
00152         btScalar m_jointMaxVelocity;//todo: implement this internally. It is unused for now, it is set by a URDF loader. 
00153         
00154         // ctor: set some sensible defaults
00155         btMultibodyLink()
00156                 :       m_mass(1),
00157                         m_parent(-1),
00158                         m_zeroRotParentToThis(0, 0, 0, 1),
00159                         m_cachedRotParentToThis(0, 0, 0, 1),
00160                         m_collider(0),
00161                         m_flags(0),
00162                         m_dofCount(0),
00163                         m_posVarCount(0),
00164                         m_jointType(btMultibodyLink::eInvalid),
00165                         m_jointFeedback(0),
00166                         m_linkName(0),
00167                         m_jointName(0),
00168             m_userPtr(0),
00169                         m_jointDamping(0),
00170                         m_jointFriction(0),
00171                         m_jointLowerLimit(0),
00172                         m_jointUpperLimit(0),
00173                         m_jointMaxForce(0),
00174                         m_jointMaxVelocity(0)
00175         {
00176                 
00177                 m_inertiaLocal.setValue(1, 1, 1);
00178                 setAxisTop(0, 0., 0., 0.);
00179                 setAxisBottom(0, 1., 0., 0.);
00180                 m_dVector.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00181                 m_eVector.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00182                 m_cachedRVector.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00183                 m_appliedForce.setValue( 0, 0, 0);
00184                 m_appliedTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00185                 //              
00186                 m_jointPos[0] = m_jointPos[1] = m_jointPos[2] = m_jointPos[4] = m_jointPos[5] = m_jointPos[6] = 0.f;
00187                 m_jointPos[3] = 1.f;                    //"quat.w"
00188                 m_jointTorque[0] = m_jointTorque[1] = m_jointTorque[2] = m_jointTorque[3] = m_jointTorque[4] = m_jointTorque[5] = 0.f;
00189                 m_cachedWorldTransform.setIdentity();
00190         }
00191 
00192     // routine to update m_cachedRotParentToThis and m_cachedRVector
00193         void updateCacheMultiDof(btScalar *pq = 0)
00194         {
00195                 btScalar *pJointPos = (pq ? pq : &m_jointPos[0]);
00196 
00197                 switch(m_jointType)
00198                 {
00199                         case eRevolute:
00200                         {
00201                                 m_cachedRotParentToThis = btQuaternion(getAxisTop(0),-pJointPos[0]) * m_zeroRotParentToThis;
00202                                 m_cachedRVector = m_dVector + quatRotate(m_cachedRotParentToThis,m_eVector);
00203 
00204                                 break;
00205                         }
00206                         case ePrismatic:
00207                         {
00208                                 // m_cachedRotParentToThis never changes, so no need to update
00209                                 m_cachedRVector = m_dVector + quatRotate(m_cachedRotParentToThis,m_eVector) + pJointPos[0] * getAxisBottom(0);
00210 
00211                                 break;
00212                         }
00213                         case eSpherical:
00214                         {
00215                                 m_cachedRotParentToThis = btQuaternion(pJointPos[0], pJointPos[1], pJointPos[2], -pJointPos[3]) * m_zeroRotParentToThis;
00216                                 m_cachedRVector = m_dVector + quatRotate(m_cachedRotParentToThis,m_eVector);
00217 
00218                                 break;
00219                         }
00220                         case ePlanar:
00221                         {
00222                                 m_cachedRotParentToThis = btQuaternion(getAxisTop(0),-pJointPos[0]) * m_zeroRotParentToThis;                            
00223                                 m_cachedRVector = quatRotate(btQuaternion(getAxisTop(0),-pJointPos[0]), pJointPos[1] * getAxisBottom(1) + pJointPos[2] * getAxisBottom(2)) + quatRotate(m_cachedRotParentToThis,m_eVector);                             
00224 
00225                                 break;
00226                         }
00227                         case eFixed:
00228                         {
00229                                 m_cachedRotParentToThis = m_zeroRotParentToThis;
00230                                 m_cachedRVector = m_dVector + quatRotate(m_cachedRotParentToThis,m_eVector);
00231 
00232                                 break;
00233                         }
00234                         default:
00235                         {
00236                                 //invalid type
00237                                 btAssert(0);
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 };
00242 
00243 
00244 #endif //BT_MULTIBODY_LINK_H
